title: Brussels sprouts
description: Roasted brussels sprouts, mozzarella, toasted sesam bread.

title: Gnocchi
description: Potato gnocchi, sauteed spinach, pine nuts, ricotta salata, pomegranate.

title: Pizza
description: Mozzarella, ham, parmigiano, pistacchio crumbs, salt, black pepper, olive oil.

title: Avocado bread
description: Toasted bread, mozzarella, avocado, salt, black pepper, olive oil, lemon juice. Tip: add cilandro on top if you have some.

title: Rigatoni alla carbonara
description: Garofalo rigatoni, guanciale (italian cured pork *similar* to bacon), egg, pecorino romano, black pepper.

title: Pizza
description: Margerita: tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmigiano, salt, black pepper, olive oil.

title: Arancini
description: Fried rice balls with spinach and mozzarella.
